newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-ENGLISH/SCOTTISH LEAGUE FIXTURES FOR OCTOBER 25-28.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ENGLISH/SCOTTISH LEAGUE FIXTURES FOR OCTOBER 25-28.

text.p: English and Scottish league soccer
fixtures for period October 25-28:
Friday, October 25:
English division one - Barnsley v Bolton.
English division three - Cambridge v Doncaster.
Saturday, October 26:
English premier league - Arsenal v Leeds, Chelsea v
Tottenham, Coventry v Sheffield Wednesday, Leicester v
Newcastle, Middlesbrough v Wimbledon, Southampton v Manchester
United, Sunderland v Aston Villa, West Ham v Blackburn.
Division one - Birmingham v Norwich, Charlton v Oxford,
Crystal Palace v Grimsby, Huddersfield v Port Vale, Ipswich v
Tranmere, Oldham v Southend, Reading v Swindon, Sheffield United
v Queens Park Rangers, Stoke v Portsmouth, West Bromwich v
Bradford.
Division two - Blackpool v Watford, Brentford v Millwall,
Bristol City v Notts County, Burnley v Plymouth, Bury v Bristol
Rovers, Chesterfield v York, Gillingham v Preston, Luton v
Bournemouth, Rotherham v Peterborough, Shrewsbury v Crewe,
Walsall v Stockport, Wycombe v Wrexham.
Division three - Barnet v Carlisle, Brighton v Fulham,
Cardiff v Leyton Orient, Chester v Hereford, Exeter v
Hartlepool, Lincoln v Colchester, Northampton v Darlington,
Scarborough v Mansfield, Scunthorpe v Rochdale, Torquay v
Swansea.
Scottish premier division - Aberdeen v Raith, Dundee United
v Hearts, Dunfermline v Kilmarnock, Hibernian v Celtic, Rangers
v Motherwell.
Division one - East Fife v Airdrieonians, Greenock Morton v
Dundee, Partick v Falkirk, St Johnstone v St Mirren, Stirling v
Clydebank.
Division two - Ayr v Brechin, Clyde v Hamilton, Dumbarton v
Queen of the South, Livingston v Stranraer, Stenhousemuir v
Berwick.
Division three - Arbroath v Alloa, Inverness v Forfar,
Montrose v Cowdenbeath, Queen's Park v Ross County.
Sunday, October 27:
English premier league - Liverpool v Derby.
Division one - Manchester City v Wolverhampton.
Scottish division three - Albion v East Stirling.
Monday, October 28:
English premier league - Nottingham Forest v Everton.
